ComicInfo.Summary:
SynopsisEDDIE NEALE had his future planned, shooting balls into the net for West Ham United F.C, but thanks to WORLD WAR II, now he's shooting NAZIS as an R.A.F tail-gunner! Shot down, he finds himself captive in castle LUNGOTZ LUFTZIG where he'll face his biggest opposition yet...his own DESTINY!
PlotEddie Neale, English R.A.F. tail gunner has always been lucky in weird ways. His plane is shot down over enemy lines, but he is the only survivor. He is caught and taken to Lungotz Luftzig prison, but Kommandant Von-Kleist doesn't have time to deal with him and locks him up in a cell.
Eddie meets the two nuns that were int he the castle before the Nazis invaded and they see something special in Eddie.
That night Eddie sees a ghost of a man, Muggenthaler, and when he tells his jailer, the solider freaks out. Muggenthaler died weeks ago and the solider believe he has come back for revenge.
That night, Muggenthaler comes back and kills two guards.
